item.title: Course Introduction and Physical Security
item.description: Course Introduction and Physical Security Topics to be Covered Computer Security: An Introduction Conventional Cryptosystems Public-Key Cryptosystems Key Management Hash Functions, Authentication Digital Signature, Identification Access Control Unix Security Windows NT Security Distributed System Security Network Security IP Security Email Security Web Security Firewalls Virtual Private Networks Reference Books Behrouz A. Forouz, Cryptography and Network Security, McGraw Hill, 2008. D. Gollmann, Computer Security, John Wiley & Sons, 1999.
